import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);function BarGraph(input,region){var options={scales:{yAxes:{title:{display:true,text:"Requests",font:{size:15}},ticks:{precision:0}},xAxes:{title:{display:true,text:"URL",font:{size:15}}}},plugins:{legend:{position:'bottom'},title:{display:true,text:region}}};var urlLabels=Object.keys(input[region].calls);var okData=urlLabels.map(function(url){return input[region].calls[url].ok;});var errorData=urlLabels.map(function(url){return input[region].calls[url].error;});var data={labels:urlLabels,datasets:[{label:'OK',data:okData,backgroundColor:'rgba(53, 162, 235, 0.5)'},{label:'Error',data:errorData,backgroundColor:'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.5)'}]};// const statusData = input[region].calls.map(d => d.status);
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{options:options,data:data});}export default BarGraph;
